name: Fridge Freezer Direct Ltd
overview:
Fridge Freezer Direct has been trading online for approximately 4 years, although her mother company, Empire Drinks & Refrigeration Ltd, has been operating in the commercial refrigeration sector for closer to 20 years. During that time, they have built up strong partnerships with the worldâ€™s leading industrial refrigeration and catering equipment manufacturers, ensuring their broad customer base ultimate price and product satisfaction.

Sourcing an extensive range of products from over 20+ suppliers, FFD are able to offer customers superior product selection and value for money, whatever the budget.

A friendly team of sales co-ordinators provide a knowledgeable, efficient service and are ready and waiting to help you with any queries you may have from checking stock levels, price quotations or just offering that little bit of advice you may need.

Offices are open for business Monday to Friday, 8.30am to 5.30pm and Saturdays 9.00am to 2.00pm. Alternatively you may place orders online 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
